forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 28. North wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 46, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. North wind 7 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
The evening drapes itself over Boston with a serene clarity, punctuated by the soft twinkle of city lights against the deepening night. As the temperature edges down to a cool 28 degrees, a gentle north wind whispers through the quiet streets. The air is crisp, invigorating, offering a refreshing bite that hints at the nearness of winter. Tomorrow promises a sunlit day, with the gentle rays compellingly inviting, although temperatures will dance around the mid-forties before retreating again into the chill of the afternoon. Though clouds may drift lazily by, it remains primarily sunny, a welcome canvas for those seeking a breath of fresh air.

Dressing in layers will serve you well; a warm coat lined with a good scarf will keep the cold at bay while allowing for mobility during your daily promenade. Perhaps a stroll through the serene paths of Boston Common or a leisurely read at an outdoor café, where the warmth of the sun can be savored alongside a steaming beverage. The simple pleasures of a walk amidst autumn leaves, or perhaps an afternoon at the museum, await those who embrace the day with an open heart. Tomorrow, with its bright promise, calls for both warmth and adventure, revealing the beauty of the city beneath the October sky.
